title: Ban Protection for New champions
body: When new champions are released they quickly reach the pick or ban status, which is fine if your playing ranked, but in normal that's where people are trying to "learn" new champions, but the just get banned out all the time. I've noticed this to be especially bad with the newest addition {{champion:498}} {{champion:497}} If you plan on doing a duo bot or just playing one of them you'll likely find them banned. Now there is always the option of blind pick, however between calling for roles, instaloks, ect... it's just toxic. That's why I'd like to see some ban protection for new champions, it'd not only allow you to play them more, but actually allow players to play them (not perama banned all game)

replies.body: If you dont want a champion banned play blind pick.

There are arguments both ways and everytime a new champ comes out there are multiple threads about this very same thing. Just play the game.

 You want to practice in normals and others want to play them in ranked. Nobody is going to be happy so RIOT has done the right thing by allowing people to whine and bitch and cry and sulk and w/e the hell entitled players want when they come to these boards and rehash this same stupid ass argument over and over and over and over. Get a life, play the game and in a few weeks it won't matter anyway. 

Basically,  get over yourself and deal with it because that is exactly what you will do in the end.
